properties.areaDesc: Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Black River To Ontonagon MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 4:17AM EST until January 7 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, heavy freezing
spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or greater expected, and may
rapidly accumulate on vessels. For the Gale Warning, northwest
winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and waves 7 to 10
feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 20 to
25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and waves 6 to 9 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI and
Black River to Ontonagon MI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 1 PM EST
/noon CST/ this afternoon to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Wednesday.
For the Gale Warning, until 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Wednesday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ this
morning.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY
